titles.title: To prohibit the use of Federal funds for official travel after Election Day of members of Congress who will not serve as members during the next Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 11/15/2006--Introduced. Prohibits the use of federal funds for official travel of defeated or retiring Members of Congress. Excludes from such prohibition travel: (1) within a Member's district or state; (2) between a Member's district or state and the Washington, D.C. Metropolitan Area; or (3) within the Washington, D.C. Metropolitan Area.
